breakfast.000: My father's coffee is the best you'll ever find in the valley.
saloon.001: The good thing about Friday is that I can watch Sam playing pool.
shop.003: I'm buying stuff for the boarding house! Father's too old to walk all the way here!$1
read.004: You can usually find me here reading underneath this tree.#$e# The fresh wind....$1
mountain.006: I like spending time with Linus on the Mountain.#$b# The creek sounds get us talking for hours.$1
hospital.007: What do you mean by you must eat more?$a
